content.question: Show all your work. Indicate clearly the methods you use, because you will be scored on the correctness of your methods as well as on the accuracy and completeness of your results and explanations. A random sample of <math alttext="100"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people from region A and a random sample of <math alttext="100"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people from region B were surveyed about their grocery-shopping habits. From the region A sample, <math alttext="16"><mstyle><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent of the people indicated that they shop for groceries online. From the region B sample, <math alttext="24"><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent of the people indicated that they shop for groceries online. At the significance level of <math alttext="alpha equals 0.05"><mstyle><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, do the data provide convincing statistical evidence that there is a difference between the two regions for the population proportions of people who shop online for groceries? Complete the appropriate inference procedure to support your answer.

frqParts.text: Show all your work. Indicate clearly the methods you use, because you will be scored on the correctness of your methods as well as on the accuracy and completeness of your results and explanations. A random sample of <math alttext="100"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people from region A and a random sample of <math alttext="100"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people from region B were surveyed about their grocery-shopping habits. From the region A sample, <math alttext="16"><mstyle><mrow><mn>16</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent of the people indicated that they shop for groceries online. From the region B sample, <math alttext="24"><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent of the people indicated that they shop for groceries online. At the significance level of <math alttext="alpha equals 0.05"><mstyle><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, do the data provide convincing statistical evidence that there is a difference between the two regions for the population proportions of people who shop online for groceries? Complete the appropriate inference procedure to support your answer.

topic.text: 6.10: Setting Up a Test for the Difference of Two Population Proportions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Identify an appropriate inference method for significance tests.
